LOGIN.LOGIN_START: Log in to start your session

NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_1_SUB: Tool for tasks, appointments, and documents.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_2_SUB: Tool for creating general announcements and treatment team messages.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_3_SUB: Tool for referencing educational material hosted on the web.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_6_SUB: Tool for publishing lab test results categorized by test group.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_8_SUB: Manage the publications and their triggers associated.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_10_SUB: Control publishing event times and frequency. View publishing logs.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_11_SUB: Manage patients listing, registration and activities.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_13_SUB: Manage studies to which are associated patients.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_15_SUB: Manage custom codes for diagnosis, test results and aliases.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_16_SUB: Manage the list of roles of the users.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_17_SUB: Manage the list of alerts and triggers for conditions.
NAVIGATION_MENU.MODULE_ID_18_SUB: Audit the users operations in OpalAdmin.

DASHBOARD.TITLE: Questionnaires
DASHBOARD.MANAGE_QUESTIONNAIRES_SUB: Create, view, update and delete questionnaires.
DASHBOARD.RESPONSE_TYPES_SUB: Create, view, update and delete response types.
DASHBOARD.MANAGE_QUESTIONS_SUB: View and edit all the questions stored in the question bank.
DASHBOARD.PUBLICATION_TOOLS_SUB: Publish and send questionnaires to patients.

PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.NAME: Name
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.NAME_EXPLANATION: Please assign a name to the questionnaire to publish in both English and in French.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.QUESTIONNAIRE_PUBLISH_EXP: Please choose the questionnaire to publish.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.PUBLISH_EXPLANATION: Select a frequency at which this questionnaire will be published.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.PATIENT_EXPLANATION: Select one of more patient triggers below. This will target patients selected here. Press select all to send to all patients. Leave blank for no trigger.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.DEMO_EXPLANATION: Please assign a demographic trigger. Leave unmarked for no trigger.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.TRIGGER_APPT_STATUS: Trigger to Send By Appointment Status
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.TAS_EXPLANATION: Select an appointment status. This will target patients with appointments having this status on the day of the appointment. Using this trigger with the appointment trigger below will target statuses for specific appointments.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.TA_EXPLANATION: Select one of more appointment triggers below. This will target patients with these specific appointments. Press select all to trigger on all appointments. Leave blank for no trigger.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.DIAGNOSIS_EXPLANATION: Select one of more diagnosis triggers below. This will target patients with these specific diagnoses. Press select all to trigger on all diagnoses. Leave blank for no trigger.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.DOCTOR_EXPLANATION: Select one of more doctor triggers below. This will target patients with these specific doctors. Press select all to trigger on all doctors. Leave blank for no triggers.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.TRIGGER_MACHINE: Trigger to Send By Treatment Machine
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.MACHINE_EXPLANATION: Select one of more machine triggers below. This will target patients with these specific treatment machines. Press select all to trigger on all treatment machines. Leave blank for no trigger.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.WILL_BE_LOCKED: The questionnaire %%QUESTIONNAIRE_NAME%% has never been published before. By doing so, it will be locked and can not be modified in the future.

PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.ERROR_PUBLICATION: An error occurred while creating the publication.
PUBLICATION_TOOL_ADD.ERROR_QUESTIONNAIRE: An error occurred while getting the questionnaires list.

PATIENTREPORT.TITLE: Patient Report
PATIENTREPORT.INTRODUCTION: Search and generate report for opal patients.

403.TITLE: 403 - Access Denied
403.MESSAGE:
You are not authorized to access this section and you will be redirected to the homepage.

Please contact your administrator for more details.

404.MESSAGE: Code 404. The resource cannot be found.

500.MESSAGE: Code 500. Internal Server Error. Answer of the server:
500.UNKNOWN: Unknown error. Please try again later.

PATIENT_REGISTRATION_SEARCH_DESCRIPTION: Please enter a valid 12-character Medicare card number along with the patient ID to start the registration process.

PATIENT_REGISTRATION_LANGUAGE_DESCRIPTIO: Please choose the primary language of choice for Opal.
PATIENT_REGISTRATION_CELLPHONE_DESCRIPTI: Please assign a cellphone number in a 10-digit format (no hyphens).

STATUS_PASSWORD_CAP_NUM_ERROR: Password must contain at least one capital letter and at least one number
